description:
[🚀 WU Optimized] Reset data of a specific input by specifying its HTML ID.
Also works with Dropdown and Search Boxes.
Simple workflow action "Reset data of an input".
Very easy to use.

✔️ FEATURES 
- Reset data of an Input 
- Reset data of a Searchbox
- Reset data of a Dropdown

name: Reset Data of an Input
plugin_instructions:
===== SETUP =====

1. Enable option to use HTML IDs in Settings -> Expose the option to add ID attribute to HTML elements

2. Specify a unique ID in your input

3. Define the type of the Input you want to reset

4. Call the action "Reset data of an input" in the "Workflow" tab
